```{r packages, results = 'hide'}
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r input, results = 'hide'}
elk <- readRDS('output/4-sociality/elkNNA.Rds')
caribou <- readRDS('output/4-sociality/caribouNNA.Rds')
```

#### Elk

```{r processing}
cols <- c('dAbsAng', 'dSI', 'predatorRSF', 'preyRSF', 'dyadDist', 'dSI', 'di')



elk[, mapply(function(col, nm) {
  print(qplot(col, bins = 30) + ggtitle(paste(.BY, nm)))
  1
}, col = .SD, nm = cols), by = season, .SDcols = cols]
```
